job.title: Analytics Partner
job.description: strongAbout AncestrybrbrstrongWhen you join Ancestry you join a humancentered company where every persons story is important We believe that by discovering the struggles and triumphs of our past we can foster deeper bonds and more meaningful connections among families and communities Our talented team of scientists engineers genealogists historians and storytellers is dedicated to empowering customers around the world from all backgrounds on their journeys of personal discoverybrbrWith more than 27 billion digitized global historical records 100 million family trees and 18 million people in our growing AncestryDNA database Ancestry helps customers discover their family story and gain a new level of understanding about their lives Passionate about dedicating your work to enriching peoples lives You belong at AncestrybrbrAncestry is looking for an Analytics Partner to join our People amp Places team to help the organization make datadriven decisions that support our talent strategy In this role you will partner closely with internal HR partners and other functions to understand business objectives gather data develop and deliver accurate and actionable reports and dashboards connecting multiple systems across the organizationbrbrstrongWhat Youll DostrongliIdentify analyze and interpret trends or patterns with HR data sets and make recommendations for business and process improvementliliDevelop reports and dashboards using various reporting and visualization tools to meet business needsliliSpearhead change from reactive to predictive analytics to create lasting business valueliliUtilize tools such as Workday Excel Tableau etc to produce dashboards reports recurring amp ad hoc and presentationsliliHandle complex requests data visualizations forecasting sequencing and trend analysisliliPartner closely with key stakeholders to identify leading and lagging indicators for key people success metrics and track those with meaningful metrics and methodologiesliliEnsure data integrity and recommend solutions where problems ariseliliWork in crossfunctional teams managing multiple priorities and stakeholdersliliWork autonomously on projects that require significant judgmentliliAnalyze large data sets to identify issues or trends Communicate data findings and action items to managementbrbrlistrongWho You Arestrongli35 years of relevant analytics experienceliliKnowledge of HR functions and practices strongly desiredliliExpert level MS Excel skills and other data visualization experience Tableau Power BI Workday Domo etcliliWorking knowledge of SQL Python R VBA or other programming languages liliExcellent communication and organization skillsliliA strong team player who is selfdriven and uses logiccritical thinking skills to solve problemsliliAbility to visualize data eg tables charts etc in a manner that helps the end user quickly and accurately understand and execute on its resultsliliIntellectual curiosity and capability as well as ability to conceptualize data into meaningful stories and conclusions that allow leaders to take actionliliWorking knowledge of an integrated HR tech stack databases and spreadsheets Workday Crystal Reports MS Office Suite with the ability to learn new software and operating systems as they ariseliliAbility to handle sensitive matters and maintain confidentialityliliKnowledge of global legalcompliance risks and requirementsbrbrlistrongAdditional InformationbrbrstrongAncestry is an Equal Opportunity Employer that makes employment decisions without regard to race color religious creed national origin ancestry sex pregnancy sexual orientation gender gender identity gender expression age mental or physical disability medical condition military or veteran status citizenship marital status genetic information or any other characteristic protected by applicable law In addition Ancestry will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilitiesbrbrAll job offers are contingent on a background check screen that complies with applicable law For San Francisco office candidates pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance Ancestry will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction recordsbrbrAncestry is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at Ancestry viaemail the Internet or in any form andor method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of Ancestry No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by Ancestry as a result of the referral or through other meansbrbr
